document_data.name: Orissar chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Orissar chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Orissar chaka was based in the port city of [[Turelve]] on the [[Golden Water]] and [[River Sarren]] in western [[Durpar]].
document_data.Activity: This chaka was composed of [[adventurer]]s who eventually delved into the [[gemstone]] business and traded [[horse]]s with [[Dambrath]].
